channel.title: Connection Error, Webclient [317]
channel.description:
Hey Guys, I was making a Web Client for my server, Edited the client so it'd download the cache, Jarred it, Signed it, etc. Now I uploaded the client.jar file to mediafire, used that link in the PHP script, Uploaded the cache.zip to FileDen, now here is my problem: When I startup my webclient, it downloads the cache, when it's done downloading it, it says "Connection error, Retrying in 60, 59 etc etc.". I'm pretty lost what the cause of this is, it might be something with the cache? Anyone got a suggestion what I could do to fix this? Thanks in advance.
Kind Regards, 1v2l3a4m5e6n

item.title: Connection Error, Webclient [317]
item.dc:creator: @1v2l3a4m5e6n 1v2l3a4m5e6n
item.description:
@1v2l3a4m5e6n wrote:

Hey Guys,
I was making a Web Client for my server, Edited the client so it’d download the cache, Jarred it, Signed it, etc. Now I uploaded the client.jar file to mediafire, used that link in the PHP script, Uploaded the cache.zip to FileDen, now here is my problem:
When I startup my webclient, it downloads the cache, when it’s done downloading it, it says “Connection error, Retrying in 60, 59 etc etc.”.
I’m pretty lost what the cause of this is, it might be something with the cache?
Anyone got a suggestion what I could do to fix this?
Thanks in advance.

Kind Regards,
